channel.title: EEIOA on Blogs of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in EEIOA on Blogs of Kai

item.title: Manual of EXIOBASE V3.8 updates
item.description: v3.8 was released in November 2020, provided with a full re-estimate of the time-series (to 2021) that heavily relies on “now-casting” economic structure (and environmental extensions). The time-series extends into the future (2021), but this is based on the now-casting procedure and projections of GDP and aggregate trade of the IMF. Main updates Macroeconomic and trade data for recent years Updated to 2018 macroeconomic data from UN, and GDP & gross import/export projections until 2022 from IMF.
